definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
artificial show of seriousness/to pretend to be solemn

sentences.english: The coin of natural patina, font dignified atmosphere, is perfectly preserved.
sentences.chinese: 該錢幣包漿自然，字體端莊大氣，品相保存完美。

sentences.english: She was the example of maiden modesty and grace.
sentences.chinese: 她是少女端莊嫺雅的楷模。

sentences.english: O shade, so sedate and decorous by day, with calm countenance and regulated pace;
sentences.chinese: 啊，白日裏那麼沉着和端莊，狀貌安詳，步履均勻。

sentences.english: Colored goblet's modelling talented Xiu, solemn natural, the line change is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 花觚的造型雋秀，端莊大方，線條變化十分豐富。

sentences.english: She is well educated, having good habits and agreeable manners.
sentences.chinese: 他受過良好的教育，沒有不良的習慣，舉止端莊。

sentences.english: Modesty is the ornament of woman.
sentences.chinese: 端莊可爲婦女增添光彩。

sentences.english: Just then, a demure female entered the room.
sentences.chinese: 正在這時，一個端莊的女子走進來。

sentences.english: More tall and stately that the alder.
sentences.chinese: 你比榿木還要高挑和端莊。

sentences.english: She dignified and beautiful, gentle calm personality, known as man of few words.
sentences.chinese: 她美麗端莊，性格溫柔平和，平時寡言少語。

sentences.english: Square on the inscription of the book are Hanlin single Lanting, dignified and elegant font.
sentences.chinese: 坊上題字均爲翰林單蘭亭所書，字體端莊幽雅。

sentences.english: She is a girl with courteous manners, graceful words, sublimated temper and profound intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 她舉止端莊，談吐優雅，氣質高雅，內涵豐富。

sentences.english: 'There's a lack of civility, ' said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝特先生說，“現在的人們缺少禮貌端莊的儀態。”

sentences.english: So try eating at home as decently as you can.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在家裏喫飯時儘量舉止端莊。

sentences.english: I hope you will behave with suitable decorum at the prize-giving tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你在明天的頒獎典禮上能表現得端莊有禮。

sentences.english: Well-groom and approachable. Interactive with good communication skills.
sentences.chinese: 儀表端莊，平易近人，積極主動，具良好溝通技巧。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
